metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10272 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.0.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact viaa crafted TIFF image, related to "WRITE of size 2048" andlibtiff/tif_next.c:64:9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
